extension.description:
VP One Page Checkout

VP One Page Checkout is a responsive, Ajax-based one-page checkout plugin designed for VirtueMart. It is fully compatible with Joomla 3, 4, and 5. For detailed user guidance, you can visit the documentation page. If you have any questions or need support, please post them in the plugin's dedicated support forum.

Copyright © 2012-2024 VirtuePlanet Services LLP. All rights reserved.

field.name: download_key
field.label: Download Key
field.description: Your VirtuePlanet download key

field.name: style
field.label: Layout Style
field.description: Select your layout style

field.name: handlerbund_compliant
field.label:
Enable HÃ¤ndlerbund
Compliant Layout
field.description: If this is enabled then Cart Form fields are separated from the order confirm button and displayed under a new section in 2nd column.

field.name: color
field.label: Color Style
field.description: Select your color style

field.name: responsive
field.label: Responsive Layout
field.description: Confirm if your Joomla Template is responsive.

field.name: only_guest
field.label:
Hide Registration and
Login Area
field.description: Hide Registration and Login area. Enable only Guest Checkout. 'Only registered users can checkout' option is VirtueMart Configuration must be disabled to use this feature.

field.name: show_full_pricelist_firststage
field.label:
Show Full Cart on
First Screen
field.description: Applicable only for Style 1 and Style 2 layout. If enabled, cart discount, cart tax, selected payment method, selected shipment method and cart total rows also will be displayed in the initial registration / login screen.

field.name: show_preloader
field.label: Show Page Preloader
field.description: If yes, page preloader is displayed until all required scripts are loaded and system becomes ready for checkout.

field.name: registration_by_default
field.label:
Registration Form
Displayed by Default
field.description: In the cart page guest checkout option is selected by default. If you enable this option then user registration option will be selected by default.

field.name: ajax_validation
field.label:
Instant Username and
Email Verification
field.description: If yes, username availability and email address verification will be done as user key-in the fields during user registration.

field.name: live_validation
field.label:
Live Username, Email
and Password Field
Validation
field.description: If no, live username, email and password strength validation will be disabled.

field.name: disable_username_validation
field.label: Disable Username Validation
field.description: If no, only alphanumeric letters are accepted as username.

field.name: auto_generate_username
field.label:
Auto Generate Username
during Registration
field.description: If Derive from Email, username is generated randomly from the Email address of the user. If Same as Email, the email address of the user is also used as the username.

field.name: auto_password
field.label:
Auto Generate Password
during Registration
field.description: If yes, password is generated automatically during registration.

field.name: hide_name_field
field.label:
Hide Name Field
in Registration Form
field.description: If yes, name field is removed from registration form.

field.name: show_email_verify
field.label:
Show Confirm Email
Field
field.description: If yes, confirm email field is displayed in registration form and in billing address form to guests.

field.name: jcore_privacyconsent
field.label: Show Joomla Privacy Consent Field
field.description: If yes, privacy consent radio selection field of core Joomla Privacy System is displayed in the registration form. This option is available in Joomla 3.9.0 and later. System - Privacy Consent plugin must be enabled to use this feature.

field.name: vpau_registration_mail
field.label: Registration Email
field.description: If VP Advanced User, registration emails are sent using the email template system of VP Advanced User. If standard, emails are sent using standard VirtueMart system.

field.name: registration_message
field.label:
Custom Registration
Advantage Message
field.description: Registration advantage message displayed to guests. Keep it empty to show the default message.

field.name: email_as_username
field.label: Email as Username - Login
field.description: If yes, only E-Mail address can be used login. If both, Username or E-Mail address can be used to login.

field.name: show_social_login
field.label: Social Login Buttons
field.description: If yes, social login buttons are displayed in login section. This option is only available in Joomla! 3.5+ when VP Advanced User component installed and configured.

field.name: social_btn_size
field.label: Size of Social Buttons
field.description: If standard, the first two login buttons are displayed with names. For others only icons are displayed in the buttons.

field.name: oncheckout_show_steps
field.label: Show Checkout Steps
field.description: Disable checkout steps during checkout

field.name: hide_prices
field.label: Hide All Prices
field.description: If yes, all prices are hidden on cart page. If guest, all prices will be hidden from guest users. Please remember that price display of shipment method and payment methods are controlled by respective shipment and payment plugins.

field.name: hide_shipto
field.label: Hide Ship To Address Form
field.description: If yes, shipping address form is not displayed on the cart page.

field.name: hide_shipment
field.label: Hide Shipment Methods
field.description: If yes, shipment methods are not displayed on the cart page. This option will only work if you have at least one shipment method available for all users and the same is select as 'Automatic Selected Shipment' in VirtueMart Configuration.

field.name: hide_discount
field.label: Hide Discount
field.description: Hide discount column in cart table

field.name: hide_sku
field.label: Hide SKU
field.description: Hide SKU column in cart table

field.name: tax_column_name
field.label: Tax Column Name
field.description: Name of the tax column in cart table. If Dynamic then then the name will be automatically derived from the name of the tax rule applied.

field.name: show_taxes_separately
field.label: Show Taxes Separately
field.description: Enable this option to show VAT Tax and other Bill Taxes separately below the price list table.

field.name: field_grouping
field.label: Address Field Grouping
field.description: If this is enabled then the address fields like name prefix, first name, last name, middle name, city, zip etc will be grouped together and displayed side by side.

field.name: check_shipto_address
field.label: BT as ST by Default
field.description: If this is enabled the checkbox for user bill to as ship to will be checked by default.

field.name: auto_update_quantity
field.label: Auto Update Quantity on Change
field.description: If yes, product quantity is auto updated on change.

field.name: quantity_update_btn
field.label: Show Quantity Update Button
field.description: If yes, product quantity update button is shown.

field.name: quantity_delete_btn
field.label: Show Product Remove Button
field.description: If yes, product remove button is shown.

field.name: show_clear_cart
field.label: Show Clear Cart
field.description: If yes, clear cart link is displayed in the cart page.

field.name: module_position
field.label: Cart Module Position
field.description: Select the module position that you want to display in the cart page.

field.name: checkout_advertisement
field.label:
Show VirtueMart Checkout
Advertisements
field.description: If yes, checkout advertisements are displayed which are set by coupon plugins, payment plugins and shipment plugins.

field.name: eu_vat
field.label: Enable EU VAT Check
field.description: If yes, VAT ID checking system is enabled.

field.name: disable_eu_vat_on_server_unavailability
field.label: Disable EU VAT Check when EU server is down
field.description: If yes, VAT ID checking system gets disabled automatically when EU server is down or unavailable.

field.name: eu_vat_disable_native_check
field.label: Disable for Buyers from Native Country
field.description: If yes, EU VAT Check will be disabled for the users from Native Country.

field.name: eu_vat_field
field.label: VAT - Shopper Field
field.description: Select your VAT - Shopper Field from the list. The entered value in this field by the users will be validated as VAT ID.

field.name: eu_vat_show_data_admin
field.label: Show VAT Data in Order Admin
field.description: If yes, EU VAT data is shown to administrators in order details.

field.name: eu_vat_required
field.label: Buyer Needs Valid VAT ID
field.description: If yes, orders will be accepted only from buyers with valid EU VAT Number.

field.name: eu_vat_ignore_groups
field.label: Shopper Groups to be Ignored
field.description: Existing users in the selected shopper groups will be ignored and their shopper groups will not changed by the system. You can use this option to deal with B2B users.

field.name: eu_vat_change_guest_group
field.label: Enable for Guests
field.description: If yes, Guest shopper group change is enabled.

field.name: eu_vat_change_registered_user_group
field.label: Enable for Registered Users
field.description: If yes, Registered User shopper group change is enabled.

field.name: vat_exempted_groups
field.label: VAT Exempted Groups
field.description: Select the groups which are to be assigned to VAT Exempted users.

field.name: vat_paying_groups
field.label: VAT Paying Groups
field.description: Select the groups which are to be assigned to VAT paying users. This should be different from 'VAT Exempted Groups'.

field.name: eu_vat_vendor_country
field.label: Native Countries
field.description: Select the native country or countries for your shop.

field.name: load_jquery
field.label: Load jQuery Library
field.description: Load jQuery library. Keep it on Auto mode if you are not sure.

field.name: load_jquery_plugins
field.label: Load jQuery Plugins
field.description: Load jQuery Hover Intent and jQuery Easing Plugins if it is not already loaded in your site. Keep it on Auto mode if you are not sure.

field.name: tos_fancybox
field.label: Use Fancybox for TOS
field.description: Use Fancybox to display Terms of Service instead of default Bootstrap Modal box.

field.name: hide_system_msg
field.label: Hide System Messages
field.description: Hide unnecessary system messages generated by plugin and shipment plugin. Eg. Please accept the terms of service to confirm, Missing field Name, Missing fields etc. They will be displayed by the plugin using Ajax when relevant.

field.name: hide_custom_msg
field.label: Custom Messages to Hide
field.description: Enter the system messages (seperated by comma) which you want to hide on checkout page.

field.name: disable_ssl
field.label:
Force Disable SSL on
Non-Cart Pages
field.description: Applicable only when SSL option is enabled in VirtueMart Configuration.

field.name: default_country
field.label: Default Country
field.description: Select the country that will be selected automatically for a new user for Billing Address and Shipping Address. Select 'None' if you do not want to assign it automatically.

field.name: force_default_country
field.label: Force Set Default Country
field.description: Applicable only when Default country option is enabled.

field.name: custom_registration_fields
field.skips: email, username, name, password, password2, agreed
field.label: Custom Registration Fields
field.description: Select which you want the user to fill-up during registration. Please note these fields data will get saved to the shopper information after the order is placed. Prior to that the data will get saved only to the cart session.

field.name: remove_duplicate_fields
field.label:
Remove Duplicate
BT Address Form
field.description: Remove 'Custom Registration Fields' from Billing Address from. Applicable only when 'Custom Registration Fields' are used.

field.name: custom_bt_update_fields
field.skips: username, name, password, password2, agreed, zip, city, virtuemart_country_id, virtuemart_state_id
field.label:
Custom BT Address
Update Fields
field.description: Select the bill to shopper fields for which you want to update the billing address in cart, when value changed.

field.name: custom_st_update_fields
field.skips: username, name, password, password2, agreed, zip, city, virtuemart_country_id, virtuemart_state_id
field.label:
Custom ST Address
Update Fields
field.description: Select the ship to shopper fields for which you want update the shipping adddress in cart, when value is changed.

field.name: enable_recaptcha
field.label: Show Captcha (If enabled)
field.description: Show captcha in registration form if core Joomla! captcha plugin is enabled and it is also enabled in Joomla! Users Configuration.

field.name: enable_placeholder
field.label: Show Placeholder
field.description: If yes, field description/tip is displayed as place holder for input type fields.

field.name: disable_autocomplete
field.label: Disable Autocomplete of Address Fields (Beta Testing)
field.description: If yes, address field autocomplete is disabled in supported browsers. This feature is still in beta testing stage and it may not work in all browsers.

field.name: style_radio_checkbox
field.label: Format Radio & Checkbox
field.description: When enabled the plugin will automatcally format the radio and checkbox selectors in the address fields with Javascript.

field.name: remove_unnecessary_links
field.label: Remove Extra Links
field.description: When enabled the plugin will find and remove all unnecessary / extra hyperlinks from the checkout page.

field.name: reload
field.label:
Reload Full Page After
Login & Registration
field.description: Reload the full page when a user successfully logged in or completes registration.

field.name: reload_after_payment_selection
field.label: Reload Full Page After Payment Method Selection

field.name: reload_payment_on_shipment_selection
field.label:
Reload Payment Methods
after Shipment Selection
field.description: Enable this if you need to reload the payment methods after shipment selection

field.name: reload_all_on_apply_coupon
field.label:
Reload Payment Methods
and Shipment Methods after
Coupon Code Submission
field.description: Enable this if you need to reload the payment and shipments methods after a coupon code is submited

field.name: extra_security
field.label: Enable Additional Security
field.description: Enable additional Ajax security if supported by your site.
